exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="happybirthday" width="1136" height="758" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="BG2_jpg" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0"/>
	<e:Image id="gift" source="Gift_png" x="523.67" y="231.33"/>
	<e:Label text="快点击你的礼物吧！" horizontalCenter="144.5" verticalCenter="-200" size="50" textColor="0x000000" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="LoadingSkin" width="1400" height="640" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image id="bg" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" width="1400" source="BG_jpg"/>
	<e:Label id="t_loading" size="67" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" text="100%" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" width="200" lineSpacing="12" horizontalCenter="0" bottom="111" height="60" textColor="0x000000"/>
	<e:Label text="资源正在加载中，请稍后..." size="80" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="60" textColor="0x000000"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="mainSkin" width="1136" height="758" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0" source="BG_jpg"/>
	<e:Group id="flashBox" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" left="424" right="0" top="367" bottom="0">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="notlike" width="221" height="78" x="715" y="580">
		<e:Label text="我不老！" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="50" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="SimHei"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="like" width="221" height="78" left="200" bottom="100">
		<e:Label text="知道了" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0" size="50" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="SimHei"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Label id="title" text="恭喜你又老了一岁" size="80" textColor="0x000000" fontFamily="SimHei" anchorOffsetY="0" height="176" anchorOffsetX="0" width="660" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="-101"/>
</e:Skin>
